item.title: Measuring Individual Differences and Adaptability
item.description: A novel methodology to understand factors influencing team performance using Alternate Realty Games (ARGs) .

item.title: StudyCrafter
item.description: A free playful platform where users can create, play, and share research projects to understand human behavior.

item.title: Gravity Bender
item.description: A fun game of solving puzzles by bending gravity.
